name: Sydney Opera House
description: Iconic performing arts venue with distinctive sail-like design, a UNESCO World Heritage site

name: Sydney Harbour Bridge
description: Massive steel arch bridge nicknamed 'The Coathanger', offering bridge climbs and panoramic views

name: Bondi Beach
description: Famous crescent-shaped beach known for surfing, sunbathing, and the Bondi Icebergs ocean pool

name: Taronga Zoo
description: Harbourside zoo featuring native Australian wildlife and exotic species with scenic city views

name: Royal Botanic Garden
description: Expansive gardens showcasing native and exotic flora, with harbor views and guided tours
